mapper.delete: select count(*) as num from course_likes where course_id=#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: select count(*) as num from course_likes where course_id=#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select: select count(*) as num from course_likes where course_id=#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
select count(*) as count from course_likes where course_id=#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
